tiers.name: Minor Shove
tiers.description: Push 1 target 1m. (Contested Might check).

tiers.name: Repel Step
tiers.description: Push self 2m in any direction.

tiers.name: Precision Trip
tiers.description: Force target to pass an Agility save or be Prone.

tiers.name: Blast Wave
tiers.description: Push all targets in a 2m radius 2m back. (Agility save for half distance).

tiers.name: Weapon Disarm
tiers.description: Force target to drop weapon (Contested Might vs. Might check).

tiers.name: Anchor
tiers.description: Hold one target stationary for 1 round (Willpower save to break free).

tiers.name: Group Containment
tiers.description: Push all targets in a 5m cone 4m back. (Agility save for half distance).

tiers.name: Crush Limb
tiers.description: Apply kinetic pressure to one limb, inflicting the Hinder status for 2 rounds (Vitality save to resist).

tiers.name: Crushing Grasp
tiers.description: Immobilize 1 target completely for 2 rounds (Willpower save to resist). (Cost 1 Presence per round to maintain).

tiers.name: Concussive Strike
tiers.description: Standard attack deals 1d4 extra non-lethal damage.

tiers.name: Armor Shock
tiers.description: Attack treats target's armor as -1 tier weaker.

tiers.name: Shockwave Cone
tiers.description: Deal 1d6 AoE damage to all targets in a 3m cone.

tiers.name: Solid Impact
tiers.description: Guaranteed Solid Hit (Stagger) if the attack succeeds.

tiers.name: Internal Echo
tiers.description: Deal 2d6 damage directly to the target's HP (ignoring outer armor).

tiers.name: Precision Burst
tiers.description: Target suffers a Minor Injury on a successful strike (once per encounter).

tiers.name: Concussive Focus
tiers.description: Attack ignores T2 armor completely and inflicts 3d6 damage.

tiers.name: Terrain Rupture
tiers.description: Destroy a piece of terrain/cover (T3 material resistance or lower).

tiers.name: Full Force Cataclysm
tiers.description: Strike deals massive 5d6 damage and forces target to pass a Vitality save or be instantly Prone.

tiers.name: Quick Leap
tiers.description: Increase jump distance/height by 100% for one turn.

tiers.name: Light Step
tiers.description: Ignore T1 movement penalties (e.g., shallow water, rough ground).

tiers.name: Velocity Boost
tiers.description: Target an ally; grant a bonus to their next Movement roll.

tiers.name: Kinetic Shield
tiers.description: Absorb damage equal to (Might Score + Character Level).

tiers.name: Barrier Dash
tiers.description: Move up to 10m through hostile terrain or crowds without penalty.

tiers.name: Group Mobility
tiers.description: Target 2 allies; grant them +3m movement for 2 rounds.

tiers.name: Kinetic Intercept
tiers.description: (Reaction) When an ally within 10m is hit by a Ranged Attack, use a concussive blast to 'shout' it from the sky. Make a contested Might check vs. the attack roll. If you win, nullify the attack.

tiers.name: Juggernaut Advance
tiers.description: Grants immunity to Prone and Staggered status effects for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Unstoppable Momentum
tiers.description: Target one ally (or self) for 2 rounds. Target is immune to Prone, Staggered, Immobilized, and all forced movement. They treat difficult terrain as normal terrain and can move through enemy spaces.

tiers.name: Taunt
tiers.description: Force 1 enemy to target you (Willpower save DC 10).

tiers.name: Threat Zone
tiers.description: All enemies leaving a 2m radius around you provoke an attack of opportunity for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Anchor Ally
tiers.description: (Reaction) Redirect the next single attack aimed at an adjacent ally to yourself.

tiers.name: Mass Taunt
tiers.description: Force all enemies in a 5m radius to target you (Willpower save DC 12).

tiers.name: Defensive Bind
tiers.description: Hold one enemy in place for 1 round (Endurance save DC 15).

tiers.name: Area Denial
tiers.description: Create a 3m radius field; enemies attempting to enter suffer the Hindered (Movement) status.

tiers.name: Immovable Object
tiers.description: Become immune to all forced movement and Prone status for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Ally Anchor
tiers.description: Redirect all attacks aimed at one designated ally to yourself for 2 rounds.

tiers.name: Absolute Rebuke
tiers.description: Create an AoE 5m field for 3 rounds. Any enemy attempting to leave the field suffers 4d6 direct HP damage.

tiers.name: Minor Reflect
tiers.description: For 3 rounds, when hit by a Melee attack, inflict 1d4 damage back to the attacker.

tiers.name: Spiked Deflection
tiers.description: (Reaction) When you successfully block a melee attack, inflict 25% of the intended damage back to the attacker.

tiers.name: Retaliatory Stun
tiers.description: (Reaction) Successfully block a Melee attack; attacker must pass a Vitality save (DC 14) or be Staggered.

tiers.name: Reactive Guard
tiers.description: After taking damage, add that damage (up to your Endurance score) to your next single attack.

tiers.name: Shield Crash
tiers.description: (Reaction) Successfully block a Melee attack; attacker must pass a Vitality save (DC 15) or be knocked Prone.

tiers.name: Full Feedback
tiers.description: (Reaction) When you successfully block a melee attack, inflict 50% of the intended damage back to the attacker.

tiers.name: Absolute Deflect
tiers.description: (Reaction) Successfully block a Ranged attack; redirect the attack at another target within 10m.

tiers.name: Vengeful Aura
tiers.description: For 3 rounds, any enemy that successfully deals damage to you suffers 2d6 direct damage immediately.

tiers.name: Damage Absorption
tiers.description: Completely absorb the damage from the next 2 incoming attacks and add that damage (max 2x Endurance score) to your next attack's damage roll.

tiers.name: Stalwart Mend
tiers.description: Restore 1d6 HP to yourself.

tiers.name: Aegis Reinforcement
tiers.description: Increase the defense rating of your Shield or Plate armor by +1 for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Guardian's Ward
tiers.description: Grant an adjacent ally +2 Defense for 1 round.

tiers.name: Guardian's Aegis
tiers.description: All allies in a 5m radius gain +1 Defense for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Purifying Resilience
tiers.description: Grant an adjacent ally immunity to T1 status effects (e.g., Minor Poison) for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Elemental Bulwark
tiers.description: Grant yourself +5 resistance against 1 chosen elemental damage type for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Wall of Stalwartness
tiers.description: Create a 5m long wall of force that grants +3 defense (cover) to all allies behind it.

tiers.name: Shared Stalwartness
tiers.description: Create a magical link between yourself and all allies within 5m for 3 rounds. All damage taken by any linked ally is reduced by 25%, and you take that damage instead (this damage cannot be reduced by your own armor).

tiers.name: Unyielding Fortress
tiers.description: As a Full Action, you and all allies within 3m become Invulnerable for 1 round (until the start of your next turn). You cannot be damaged, moved, or affected by any negative status effects. While this is active, you cannot move or take any other actions.

tiers.name: Stifle Movement
tiers.description: On a successful hit, impose a -1 penalty on target's next Movement roll.

tiers.name: Weakened Attack
tiers.description: On a successful hit, impose a -2 penalty on target's next attack roll.

tiers.name: Pressure Stun
tiers.description: On a successful hit, impose the Staggered status effect.

tiers.name: Nerve Pinch
tiers.description: On a successful hit, impose the Hinder status on one limb (e.g., Arm or Leg) for 2 rounds.

tiers.name: AP Drain
tiers.description: On a successful hit, force them to spend 1 extra AP on their next action.

tiers.name: Muscle Spasm
tiers.description: Target suffers the Hinder status on their legs for 3 rounds (Halved Movement). (Fortitude save DC 15 to resist).

tiers.name: Vital Lock
tiers.description: Immobilize target completely for 2 rounds (Willpower save DC 16 to resist).

tiers.name: Sensory Shutoff
tiers.description: Blind or Deaf target for 3 rounds (Fortitude save DC 17).

tiers.name: Quivering Palm
tiers.description: On a successful Unarmed strike, the target must make a Vitality save (DC 18). On a failure, they fall to 0 HP after 1d4 rounds. On a success, they take 6d6 direct damage.

tiers.name: Clean Strike
tiers.description: Attack deals 1d4 extra damage.

tiers.name: Ghost Strike
tiers.description: Next Unarmed attack ignores T1 armor completely.

tiers.name: Armor Flicker
tiers.description: Attack treats target's armor as -2 tiers weaker.

tiers.name: Internal Shock
tiers.description: Deal 2d6 damage directly to HP (ignoring outer armor).

tiers.name: Chain Hit
tiers.description: If your attack hits, you may make a free follow-up attack against another target within 3m.

tiers.name: Critical Pierce
tiers.description: Your next attack automatically converts a Solid Hit into a CriticalHit.

tiers.name: Force Rupture
tiers.description: Attack ignores T3 armor completely and inflicts 4d4 damage.

tiers.name: Vital Organ Strike
tiers.description: Inflict a MinorInjury on the Torso/Head location of the target (Once per encounter).

tiers.name: Unblockable Ki Strike
tiers.description: Attack ignores all passive defenses and deals damage equal to 5d8 plus your Fortitude score.

tiers.name: Centered Mind
tiers.description: (Minor Action) You center your Ki. Gain +2 on all Willpower saves for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Deflect Missile
tiers.description: Gain a bonus defense against the next single incoming RangedAttack.

tiers.name: Purge Ailment
tiers.description: (Minor Action) You use your Ki to expel impurities. Instantly remove one T1 status effect (e.g., Staggered, Minor Poison) from yourself.

tiers.name: Aura of Purity
tiers.description: You project your inner calm. You and all allies within 3m gain +2 on all saves to resist T1 status effects for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Share Resilience
tiers.description: (Reaction) When an adjacent ally takes damage, you can use your reaction to take half of that damage for them (this damage cannot be reduced).

tiers.name: Inner Fire
tiers.description: Gain immunity to all T1 environmental effects (e.g., Minor Cold, Minor Heat) for 5 rounds.

tiers.name: Mass Purge
tiers.description: (Minor Action) You expel all impurities in your area. Instantly remove one T1 status effect from yourself and all allies within 3m.

tiers.name: Resilient Will
tiers.description: Grant an ally immunity to the next 2 instances of Composure damage they would suffer.

tiers.name: Transcendent Self
tiers.description: (Full Action) For 2 rounds, you are immune to all negative status effects, damage-over-time, and Composure damage. (You can still be damaged).

tiers.name: Nausea
tiers.description: Impose a -1 penalty on all target's attack rolls for 2 rounds. (Vitality save DC 12 to resist).

tiers.name: Weaken Limbs
tiers.description: Target suffers the Hinder status on their arms for 2 rounds. (Vitality save DC 13 to resist).

tiers.name: Pain Block
tiers.description: Target suffers a -2 penalty to all Agility checks for 2 rounds. (Vitality save DC 14 to resist).

tiers.name: Bio-Toxin Cloud
tiers.description: Create a 3m cloud for 3 rounds; enemies suffer 1d4 damage when starting turn in it.

tiers.name: Fatigue Drain
tiers.description: Drain 1d6 points from target's Fatigue pool. (Vitality save DC 15 to resist).

tiers.name: Contagion Carrier
tiers.description: Target must pass a Vitality check (DC 15) or spread their current T1 disease/poison to an adjacent ally.

tiers.name: Rapid Wasting
tiers.description: Inflict a T2 Disease status effect that deals continuous HP damage. (Vitality save DC 16 to resist).

tiers.name: Organ Spasm
tiers.description: Target is Stunned for 2 rounds as their muscles and organs seize violently. (Vitality save DC 17 to resist).

tiers.name: Biological Collapse
tiers.description: Target suffers MajorInjuries to both Arms and both Legs (Vitality save DC 18 to resist).

tiers.name: Minor Poison
tiers.description: Inflict T1 Poison status effect. (Vitality save DC 12 to resist).

tiers.name: Pain Receptor Spike
tiers.description: Deal 1d6 direct damage that bypasses armor.

tiers.name: Internal Bleed
tiers.description: Inflict a T1 Bleeding status effect that cannot be stabilized by basic First Aid. (Vitality save DC 14 to resist).

tiers.name: Toxic Coating
tiers.description: Enchant your weapon to deal 1d4 bonus poison damage for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Vicious Poison
tiers.description: Inflict T2 Poison status effect. (Vitality save DC 15 to resist).

tiers.name: Blood Boiling
tiers.description: Deal 3d4 damage directly to the target's HP by rapidly elevating their core temperature.

tiers.name: Rupture Vitals
tiers.description: You strike at a critical organ. Inflict a Minor Injury on the Torso (Once per encounter).

tiers.name: Rapid Degeneration
tiers.description: Target suffers a -1 penalty to their Vitality score for the duration of the encounter. (Vitality save DC 17 to resist).

tiers.name: Liquefy
tiers.description: Target must make a Vitality save (DC 18). On a failure, they are Stunned for 1 round and take 4d6 direct damage. They must save again at the start of their next turn or repeat the effect.

tiers.name: Stabilize
tiers.description: Instantly remove the Bleeding (T1) status effect from a target.

tiers.name: Minor Heal
tiers.description: Restore 1d8 HP to a target.

tiers.name: Vitality Surge
tiers.description: (Minor Action) Your body's natural resilience surges. Restore 1d6 HP to yourself. This ability costs 0 Stamina, but can only be used 3 times per encounter.

tiers.name: Cure Toxin
tiers.description: Cure the target of any T1 Poison or Disease effect.

tiers.name: Repair Minor Injury
tiers.description: Immediately remove a MinorInjury from a limb.

tiers.name: Rapid Regeneration
tiers.description: Target restores 1d4 HP at the start of their turn for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Repair Major Injury
tiers.description: Immediately reduce the severity of a MajorInjury to a MinorInjury.

tiers.name: Mass Health
tiers.description: Restore 2d8 HP to all allies within 5m.

tiers.name: Full Life Restore
tiers.description: Instantly restore the target's HP to its maximum value and remove all negative status and injury effects.

tiers.name: Ankle Lock
tiers.description: (Reaction) When an enemy moves within 2m of you, force an Agility save (DC 12) or their speed is halved for this turn.

tiers.name: Hamstring
tiers.description: On a successful hit, impose a -2 penalty on target's next Agility check.

tiers.name: Crippling Step
tiers.description: On a successful hit, target must pass an Agility save (DC 14) or cannot take a Move action on their next turn.

tiers.name: Binding Field
tiers.description: Create a 3m area for 3 rounds. Enemies entering suffer a -2 penalty to their Agility checks.

tiers.name: Pinpoint Cage
tiers.description: Instantly move to surround 1 target with up to 3 selected allies, preventing them from moving away.

tiers.name: Mass Restriction
tiers.description: Halve the movement speed of all enemies within 5m for 2 rounds (Agility save DC 15 to resist).

tiers.name: Temporal Tether
tiers.description: Target loses their entire next Movement action (Agility save DC 16 to resist).

tiers.name: Kinetic Tether
tiers.description: Tether yourself to an enemy for 3 rounds (Agility save DC 17). Every time you use a Move action, the target is pulled 2m in your direction.

tiers.name: Temporal Snare
tiers.description: (Full Action) Target must pass an Agility save (DC 18). On a failure, they are removed from initiative for 1d4 rounds. On a success, they are Stunned for 1 round.

tiers.name: Riposte
tiers.description: (Reaction) Successfully evade a melee attack. Deliver a free T1 (1d4 damage) counter-attack.

tiers.name: Fluid Strike
tiers.description: Your next Dual Knives or Dueling Blade attack is automatically a Solid Hit.

tiers.name: Evasion Burst
tiers.description: Move through an enemy's threatened area and deal 1d6 damage to them as you pass (Agility save DC 14 for half).

tiers.name: Counter-Stun
tiers.description: (Reaction) Successfully evade an attack. Attacker must pass a Vitality save (DC 14) or be Stunned for 1 round.

tiers.name: Whirlwind Attack
tiers.description: Attack all enemies within 2m of you. Gain a bonus 2m movement action if successful.

tiers.name: Perfect Counter
tiers.description: (Reaction) Successfully evade a Ranged Attack and make a free T2 (1d8 damage) counter-attack against the attacker.

tiers.name: Graceful Sever
tiers.description: On a successful strike, inflict a Minor Injury on the target's arm or leg (Once per encounter).

tiers.name: Chain Counter
tiers.description: (Reaction) Successfully evade an attack. Make a free T3 counter-attack (1d10 damage) against two different adjacent enemies.

tiers.name: Thousand Cuts
tiers.description: (Full Action) Make one attack roll. If you hit, the target is Hindered (All Limbs) for 1 round. At the start of their next turn, they suffer 8d6 Bleed damage.

tiers.name: Quick Step
tiers.description: Move 2m as a bonus action.

tiers.name: Pull Aside
tiers.description: (Reaction) Instantly move an adjacent ally 2m out of an AoE threat.

tiers.name: Shadow Step
tiers.description: Move up to 5m without provoking attacks of opportunity.

tiers.name: Swap Position
tiers.description: Instantly exchange positions with an ally within 10m.

tiers.name: Blur
tiers.description: You and all allies within 3m move as a blur. The next single attack against each of you has a 50% chance to miss.

tiers.name: Mass Dash
tiers.description: All allies within 5m gain a +3m bonus to their next Movement roll.

tiers.name: Reposition Team
tiers.description: Select up to 3 allies. Instantly move all selected allies 5m to new locations.

tiers.name: Nullify Attack
tiers.description: Instantly grant an ally immunity to the next 2 instances of damage.

tiers.name: Phase Shift
tiers.description: (Full Action) You and all allies within 5m instantly teleport to any location you can see within 30m.

tiers.name: Minor Trip
tiers.description: Create a subtle snare on the ground. Next enemy crossing must pass Agility save (DC 12) or be Prone.

tiers.name: Alarm Snare
tiers.description: Create a subtle trip wire that creates a loud audible alert when triggered.

tiers.name: Illusionary Wall
tiers.description: Create a non-physical 3m wall that prevents enemies from seeing through it (Tactics save DC 14 to disbelieve).

tiers.name: Explosive Trap
tiers.description: Set a snare that deals 2d6 AoE damage when triggered.

tiers.name: Complex Trap
tiers.description: Create a snare that inflicts the Hinder status on a triggered limb for 3 rounds (Agility save DC 15 to resist).

tiers.name: Siphoning Trap
tiers.description: Set a snare. When triggered, the target must pass a Willpower save (DC 15) or lose 1d6 of their primary resource (Chi, Stamina, etc.).

tiers.name: Mass Confusion
tiers.description: Create a widespread illusion that gives a -2 penalty to all enemy perception checks in a 10m radius.

tiers.name: Sabotage
tiers.description: Render a complex mechanism (Artifice T3 difficulty or lower) inoperable until repaired.

tiers.name: Absolute Deception
tiers.description: Create a perfect illusionary copy of yourself or an ally that takes 1 hit before vanishing.

tiers.name: Exposed Flank
tiers.description: Deal 1d4 extra damage when attacking a target engaged with an ally.

tiers.name: Feint
tiers.description: Target suffers -2 defense against your next attack.

tiers.name: Trick Shot
tiers.description: Your next Hand Crossbow attack is automatically a Solid Hit.

tiers.name: Critical Opening
tiers.description: Your next Dueling Blade attack is automatically a Critical Hit if the target is Staggered or Prone.

tiers.name: Chain Reaction
tiers.description: If your attack hits, you may make a free T3 follow-up attack against another target within 3m.

tiers.name: Vicious Bleed
tiers.description: Inflict a T2 Bleeding status effect on the target (Vitality save DC 15 to resist).

tiers.name: Exploit Fracture
tiers.description: Attack treats target's armor as -3 tiers weaker for this strike.

tiers.name: Targeted Sever
tiers.description: Attack a limb. On a successful strike, the limb suffers a Minor Injury (Once per encounter).

tiers.name: Fatal Blow
tiers.description: Automatically inflict a Major Injury on a target's Torso (Willpower save DC 18 to resist).

tiers.name: Conceal Object
tiers.description: Successfully hide a small object on a person or in a scene (Contested Finesse vs. Awareness check).

tiers.name: Shadow Step
tiers.description: Move up to 5m and immediately become Concealed.

tiers.name: Mass Distraction
tiers.description: All allies in a 10m radius gain a +2 bonus to their next Stealth or Sleight of Hand check.

tiers.name: Group Concealment
tiers.description: All allies within 5m gain the Concealed status for 3 rounds (as long as they are not in bright light).

tiers.name: Invert Senses
tiers.description: Target an enemy (Willpower save DC 15). On a fail, they see allies as enemies (and vice versa) for 1 round. They will not attack allies, but will not aid them.

tiers.name: Perfect Shadow
tiers.description: Become completely invisible for 1 round (until you take an offensive action).

tiers.name: Vanishing Act
tiers.description: Successfully disappear from an enemy's line of sight and instantly move up to 10m.

tiers.name: Mass Invisibility
tiers.description: Select up to 3 allies. All become invisible for 1 round (until they take an offensive action).

tiers.name: Absolute Concealment
tiers.description: You become invisible for 3 rounds (until you take an offensive action), suffering no penalties for light/movement.

tiers.name: Slow Reaction
tiers.description: Impose a -3 penalty on target's next Initiative roll.

tiers.name: Lagging Step
tiers.description: Halve target's movement speed on their next two turns.

tiers.name: AP Drain
tiers.description: Target loses their next Minor Action Point (AP).

tiers.name: Time Distortion
tiers.description: Force an enemy to act last in the initiative order for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Reverse Movement
tiers.description: Target must move 5m back towards their position from the previous turn.

tiers.name: Delayed Action
tiers.description: Target an ally or enemy. Their next action is 'delayed' until the end of the round, after everyone else has gone.

tiers.name: Time Lock
tiers.description: Force one enemy to lose their entire next turn (Willpower save DC 16 to resist).

tiers.name: Area Stasis
tiers.description: Immobilize all targets in a 3m radius for 1 round (Willpower save DC 17 to resist).

tiers.name: Chronal Sever
tiers.description: Remove one target from the timeline entirely for 2 rounds (Willpower save DC 18 to resist).

tiers.name: Minor Rust
tiers.description: Inflict 1d4 damage on a target's armor or object (reduces DR by 1).

tiers.name: Ageing Touch
tiers.description: Inflict 1d6 direct damage. Target suffers a temporary -1 penalty to Endurance for 2 rounds.

tiers.name: Rapid Decay
tiers.description: Destroy a single non-magical object (weapon, door) if its material resistance is T1 or lower.

tiers.name: Entropy Strike
tiers.description: Attack deals 2d6 direct damage that bypasses armor. Target suffers -1 to all saves for 1 round.

tiers.name: Temporal Fatigue
tiers.description: Drain 1d6 points from target's Stamina or Chi pool (Willpower save DC 15 to resist).

tiers.name: Accelerated Entropy
tiers.description: Target must make a Logic save (DC 15). On a failure, all non-magical effects on them (buffs, poisons, etc.) immediately advance 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Age Weapon
tiers.description: Target an enemy's weapon. It suffers a Major Injury (becomes broken/unusable) until repaired (Logic save DC 16 to resist).

tiers.name: Mass Ageing
tiers.description: All enemies in a 5m radius suffer 3d6 direct damage and a -1 penalty to all stats for 2 rounds (Logic save DC 17 for half/negate).

tiers.name: Event Echo
tiers.description: Target suffers damage equal to the maximum damage they suffered in the previous 2 rounds.

tiers.name: Foresight
tiers.description: Roll one check with Advantage before taking an action.

tiers.name: Minor Repair
tiers.description: Partially reverse the damage done to an object, improving its defense rating by 2.

tiers.name: Reset Step
tiers.description: Instantly move back to the position you occupied at the start of your turn.

tiers.name: Minor Reversal
tiers.description: (Reaction) Reverse the damage from the last attack made against you in the previous round.

tiers.name: Rewind Ally
tiers.description: Restore an ally's HP to the amount it was at the end of the previous round.

tiers.name: Perfect Calculation
tiers.description: Instantly know the highest and lowest possible roll outcome for the next contested roll.

tiers.name: Moment of Chance
tiers.description: Reverse the outcome of the last action (not just damage) taken by yourself or an ally (once per encounter).

tiers.name: Temporal Cache
tiers.description: Draw a specific item (max size Medium) into your hands from your inventory, bypassing the inventory action cost.

tiers.name: Full Reset
tiers.description: Restore all allies' HP, Stamina, and Chi to their starting amounts (once per campaign).

tiers.name: Wall of Mist
tiers.description: Create a 5m area of fog; -2 penalty on ranged attacks passing through it.

tiers.name: Minor Tremor
tiers.description: Create a small earthquake in a 3m area. Targets must pass an Agility save (DC 13) or be Prone.

tiers.name: Elemental Snare
tiers.description: Create a 3m area of fire/ice that hinders movement (T1 Hinder).

tiers.name: Elemental Wall
tiers.description: Create a 5m wall of fire/ice that blocks movement and line of sight and deals 1d6 damage to those who pass.

tiers.name: Flash Freeze
tiers.description: Target an enemy (Vitality save DC 15). On a failure, they are Immobilized for 2 rounds, encased in ice. (Ice has 10 HP).

tiers.name: Toxic Fumes
tiers.description: Create a 5m cloud. Targets in it suffer the Nausea status effect (Vitality save DC 15 to resist).

tiers.name: Mass Quake
tiers.description: Targets in a 5m area must pass a Vitality check (DC 16) or be knocked Prone and Stunned for 1 round.

tiers.name: Absolute Darkness
tiers.description: Plunge a 10m radius into total, magical darkness for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Elemental Dominance
tiers.description: Instantly control a 10m environmental hazard (e.g., redirect a fire, freeze a river).

tiers.name: Focused Blast
tiers.description: Deal 1d10 single-target elemental damage.

tiers.name: Elemental Cascade
tiers.description: Deal 1d8 damage to all targets in a 5m line.

tiers.name: Elemental Weapon
tiers.description: Enchant your weapon to deal 1d4 extra elemental damage for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Elemental Brand
tiers.description: Deal 2d6 elemental damage (e.g., Fire). If the attack hits, the target is 'Branded' for 1 round. All subsequent 'Fire' damage from any source deals +1d4 bonus damage.

tiers.name: Elemental Burst
tiers.description: Deal 2d6 AoE damage in a 3m radius.

tiers.name: Penetrating Bolt
tiers.description: Attack ignores T2 armor against a target.

tiers.name: Rune of Destruction
tiers.description: Embed a rune that explodes on your next turn, dealing 4d6 AoE damage.

tiers.name: Environmental Strike
tiers.description: Call down a massive elemental strike (e.g., lightning, meteor) that deals 5d6 damage to a 5m area.

tiers.name: Arcane Annihilation
tiers.description: Deal damage equal to your Knowledge score multiplied by 3 as elemental damage.

tiers.name: Warding
tiers.description: Grant +1 defense to an ally against a specific damage type for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Arcane Shield
tiers.description: (Reaction) When an ally within 10m is hit, grant them Temporary HP equal to your Knowledge Score.

tiers.name: Ranged Defense
tiers.description: All allies in a 5m radius gain +1 defense against Ranged attacks for 1 round.

tiers.name: Dispel Magic
tiers.description: Instantly remove one T2 or lower magical effect (buff or debuff) from a target.

tiers.name: Energy Dampener
tiers.description: Grant +5 resistance to 1 chosen elemental damage type for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Spell Siphon
tiers.description: (Reaction) When an enemy casts a T4 or lower spell, make a contested Knowledge check. On a success, nullify their spell and restore Guile equal to its cost.

tiers.name: Total Warding
tiers.description: Grant immunity to T2 status effects (e.g., Major Poison, Disease) for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Group Energy Dampener
tiers.description: Grant all allies in a 5m radius +5 resistance to 1 chosen elemental damage type for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Prismatic Shell
tiers.description: (Full Action) For 3 rounds, you are immune to all elemental damage and all T3 or lower status effects. Any enemy that strikes you in melee must pass a save or suffer a random T1 elemental status.

tiers.name: Evil Eye
tiers.description: Target 1 enemy. They suffer 1d6 Composure Damage.

tiers.name: Bad Juju
tiers.description: Push 1 target 2m using spiritual force (Awareness save DC 13 to resist).

tiers.name: Vex
tiers.description: Target suffers a -2 penalty to all Awareness checks for 3 rounds (Awareness save DC 14 to resist).

tiers.name: Aura of Dread
tiers.description: Target all enemies in a 5m radius. Inflict 1d6 Composure damage (Willpower save DC 14 for half).

tiers.name: Binding Curse
tiers.description: Compel 1 enemy to remain stationary for 2 rounds (Willpower save DC 15 to resist).

tiers.name: Mark of the Loa
tiers.description: Target suffers a -1 penalty to all actions for 3 rounds due to overwhelming dread (Willpower save DC 15 to resist).

tiers.name: Group Panic
tiers.description: Inflict 2d6 Composure damage on all enemies in a 5m radius and force them to attempt to Flee (Willpower save DC 16 to resist Flee).

tiers.name: Puppet's Curse
tiers.description: Target must perform a single, non-harmful action of your choice on their next turn (Willpower save DC 17 to resist).

tiers.name: Soul Trap
tiers.description: Immobilize 1 target completely for 3 rounds (Willpower save DC 18 to resist).

tiers.name: Hex Bolt
tiers.description: Deal 1d6 damage to the target's Composure pool.

tiers.name: Touch of the Grave
tiers.description: Inflict 1d8 ethereal damage that bypasses physical armor.

tiers.name: Siphon Essence
tiers.description: Deal 1d6 damage to the target's Chi or Stamina pool (Willpower save DC 14 for half).

tiers.name: Gris-Gris
tiers.description: (Minor Action) Place a 'bad luck' charm. For 3 rounds, 25% of all Ethereal damage you deal also deals damage to the target's Composure pool.

tiers.name: Breath of the Grave
tiers.description: Deal 2d8 ethereal damage to all targets in a 5m line.

tiers.name: Shatter Will
tiers.description: Deal 3d6 damage to the target's Composure pool (Willpower save DC 15 for half).

tiers.name: Rend Spirit
tiers.description: Deal 4d6 damage that splits equally between HP and target's primary Resource pool.

tiers.name: Devour Spirit
tiers.description: Drain 25% of the target's current primary Resource pool (Willpower save DC 17 to resist).

tiers.name: Feast of the Loa
tiers.description: Target must pass a Willpower save (DC 18). On a failure, they suffer 8d6 Ethereal damage and you drain their entire primary resource pool to zero, restoring that amount to your Tactics pool.

tiers.name: Ancestor's Blessing
tiers.description: Restore 1d6 Composure to an ally.

tiers.name: Spirit Mend
tiers.description: Restore 1d8 HP to an ally, but you suffer 1d4 Composure damage yourself (a transfer of life force).

tiers.name: Ancestor's Ward
tiers.description: Grant an adjacent ally a +2 bonus to all Willpower saves for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Read the Juju
tiers.description: Identify all status effect vulnerabilities (e.g., 'Vulnerable to Fire') of 1 target.

tiers.name: Totemic Warden
tiers.description: Summon a spirit totem for 3 rounds. At the start of your turn, it heals 1d4 Composure to the most 'shaken' ally within 5m.

tiers.name: Ritual of Courage
tiers.description: Grant all allies in a 5m radius immunity to T1 Fear effects for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Spirit Sight
tiers.description: All allies gain 'low-light vision' for the remainder of the encounter.

tiers.name: Shaman's Chant
tiers.description: Restore 3d6 Composure to all allies within 10m.

tiers.name: Ancestral Aegis
tiers.description: (Full Action) You and all allies within 10m are immune to all Composure damage and Fear effects for 3 rounds. All allies in the aura are immediately cured of the Shaken status.

tiers.name: Minor Shift
tiers.description: Create a 1m patch of random, chaotic terrain (e.g., ice, mud, thorns).

tiers.name: Random Stumble
tiers.description: Inflict a random -1 penalty on one of target's Derived Stats (Con, End, Agi, Aware) for 1 round.

tiers.name: Unstable Field
tiers.description: Create a 3m radius field. All characters (friend or foe) in it suffer a -1 penalty to one randomly determined core stat.

tiers.name: Area Mutate
tiers.description: Create a 5m radius field of chaotic terrain, imposing a -1 penalty on Agility for 2 rounds.

tiers.name: Psychic Feedback
tiers.description: Target must pass a Willpower check (DC 15) or suffer Composure damage equal to the resource cost of their last ability used.

tiers.name: Curse of Probability
tiers.description: Target an enemy (Willpower save DC 15). For 3 rounds, any time they roll a 1d20, they must roll twice and take the worse result (Disadvantage).

tiers.name: Reality Ripple
tiers.description: All non-essential objects in a 10m area are randomly destroyed, moved, or turned into something else.

tiers.name: Mass Instability
tiers.description: Create a 5m radius field. All characters (friend or foe) in it must pass a Willpower check (DC 17) or be Stunned for 1 round.

tiers.name: Full Entropy
tiers.description: Cause Minor Injuries to 1d4 randomly determined limbs on 1 target (Willpower save DC 18 to resist).

tiers.name: Random Blast
tiers.description: Deal 1d10 damage of a randomly determined type.

tiers.name: Unstable Bolt
tiers.description: Deal 2d6 damage. If the damage roll is even, the target is Staggered. If it's odd, they are Hindered (Movement).

tiers.name: Chaos Field
tiers.description: Create a 3m radius field that deals 1d6 random damage to any (friend or foe) character that starts its turn there.

tiers.name: Volatile Charge
tiers.description: Attack deals 2d6 damage, and the target must pass a Vitality save (DC 14) or immediately suffer a T1 Poison or Bleed status (randomly determined).

tiers.name: Unpredictable Nova
tiers.description: Deal 6d6 damage, split randomly between 1d6 targets (friend or foe) in a 10m radius.

tiers.name: Chain Chaos
tiers.description: Your next attack deals 3d6 random elemental damage. If it hits, it immediately arcs to a random target within 5m (friend or foe) for 2d6 random damage.

tiers.name: Full Cataclysm
tiers.description: Deal 6d6 damage that is randomly split between HP, Composure, and primary Resource pools of the target.

tiers.name: Paradox Strike
tiers.description: Deal damage equal to your Intuition score multiplied by 3 to a randomly determined target (friend or foe) within 10m.

tiers.name: Dimensional Rift
tiers.description: Create a 5m radius rift. All characters (friend or foe) in the area suffer 5d6 random damage and 2d6 Composure damage.

tiers.name: Minor Surge
tiers.description: Randomly boost one of your core stats (A-L) by +1 for 1 round.

tiers.name: Resist Random
tiers.description: Gain a +2 bonus resistance against the next 2 instances of random damage or status effects.

tiers.name: Ally Mutation
tiers.description: Target an ally. Randomly grant them a T2-level physical advantage (e.g., hardened skin, speed boost) for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Self-Morph
tiers.description: You mutate your form for 3 rounds. Choose one: Gills (breathe water), Claws (1d6 Unarmed damage), or Wings (Flight 5m).

tiers.name: Weapon Mutation
tiers.description: Permanently change your weapon's damage type (e.g., Slashing -> Impact) and grant it +1 damage bonus.

tiers.name: Elemental Randomize
tiers.description: Grant all allies immunity to a T1 elemental damage type (randomly determined) for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Reality Shift
tiers.description: Instantly change the weather or environmental lighting for the remainder of the encounter.

tiers.name: Full Mutation
tiers.description: Grant yourself 1d4 randomly determined T3 physical bonuses (e.g., Flight, Regeneration) for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Reality Inversion
tiers.description: (Full Action) You tear a hole in reality. All allies in 10m are healed for 4d6 HP. All enemies in 10m suffer 4d6 direct damage. You, the caster, must pass a Willpower save (DC 18) or be Stunned for 1 round by the backlash.

tiers.name: Distract
tiers.description: Target 1 enemy. Suffer a -1 penalty to all actions for 1 round.

tiers.name: Push Object
tiers.description: Telekinetically move a small object (max weight 10kg) 5m.

tiers.name: Daze
tiers.description: Target 1 enemy. Impose the Staggered status effect for 1 round (Willpower save DC 14 to resist).

tiers.name: Mental Confusion
tiers.description: Target suffers a -2 penalty to all Willpower checks for 3 rounds (Willpower save DC 14 to resist).

tiers.name: Unravel Focus
tiers.description: Target immediately loses Focus and cannot use abilities that require concentration for 2 rounds (Willpower save DC 15 to resist).

tiers.name: Mind Spike
tiers.description: Deal 3d6 direct Composure damage (Willpower save DC 15 for half) and drain 1d4 Guile.

tiers.name: Brain Lock
tiers.description: Inflict 2d6 Composure damage. If this drops Composure to zero, the target is instantly Immobilized in Fear for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Puppet Master
tiers.description: Gain temporary control of a non-hostile NPC for 1 round (Willpower save DC 17 to resist).

tiers.name: Mindwipe
tiers.description: Erase the target's memory of the last 10 minutes (Willpower save DC 18 to resist).

tiers.name: Mental Echo
tiers.description: Deal 1d6 direct Composure damage.

tiers.name: Object Hurl
tiers.description: Deal 1d10 damage by violently throwing a nearby object at the target.

tiers.name: Psychic Drain
tiers.description: Drain 1d6 from the target's Instinct pool (Willpower save DC 14 for half).

tiers.name: Psychic Crush
tiers.description: Deal 3d6 direct Composure damage (Willpower save DC 14 for half).

tiers.name: Psychic Scream
tiers.description: Deal 2d6 damage to the Composure pools of all targets in a 5m cone.

tiers.name: Targeted Concussion
tiers.description: Deal 3d6 damage. Target must pass a Vitality check (DC 15) or be Stunned for 1 round.

tiers.name: Mental Disintegration
tiers.description: Target's armor suffers a Major Injury (becomes broken/unusable) as you telekinetically tear it apart (Willpower save DC 16 to resist).

tiers.name: Composure Collapse
tiers.description: Inflict 5d6 points of Major Composure damage.

tiers.name: Mass Hurl
tiers.description: Throw up to 3 enemies 5m away (Willpower save DC 18 to remain in place).

tiers.name: Mind Shield
tiers.description: Gain a +2 bonus defense to your next Composure check.

tiers.name: Barrier
tiers.description: Create a temporary shield that absorbs the next 1d8 damage instances.

tiers.name: Group Defense
tiers.description: Grant +1 defense to all allies within 5m for 1 round.

tiers.name: Telekinetic Shield
tiers.description: Create a sustained barrier that absorbs up to 15 total points of damage for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Psychic Repulsion
tiers.description: Enemies attempting to enter a 3m radius around you suffer 1d6 Composure damage.

tiers.name: Clarity
tiers.description: Restore 2d6 Composure to yourself or an ally and remove the Shaken status.

tiers.name: Projected Will
tiers.description: Transfer your Willpower score as a bonus to an ally's Defense for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Mass Clarity
tiers.description: Restore 3d6 Composure to all allies within 5m.

tiers.name: Mind Fortress
tiers.description: (Full Action) Create a 10m aura for 3 rounds. All allies in the aura are immune to all Composure damage and mental status effects (Fear, Charm, Stun). You, the caster, gain +5 to your Willpower stat for the duration.

tiers.name: Fluster
tiers.description: Target 1 enemy. They suffer a -1 penalty to their next Defense roll.

tiers.name: Draw Gaze
tiers.description: Compel target to only look at you for 1 round.

tiers.name: Vulnerable Posture
tiers.description: Target suffers a -2 penalty to their next Willpower check.

tiers.name: Target Lock
tiers.description: Compel a group of enemies (3m radius) to prioritize a single designated target (Willpower save DC 14).

tiers.name: Mass Confusion
tiers.description: All enemies in a 5m radius suffer a -1 penalty to Awareness checks for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Opening Attack
tiers.description: Grant the next ally attacking the target a +2 bonus to their attack roll.

tiers.name: Mass Demoralize
tiers.description: Target all enemies in a 5m radius. Inflict 2d6 Composure damage.

tiers.name: Compel Surrender
tiers.description: Force a non-hostile NPC to immediately surrender (Willpower save DC 17).

tiers.name: Total Loyalty
tiers.description: Instantly turn a hostile NPC of T4 or lower into a temporary ally for the remainder of the encounter.

tiers.name: Marked Target
tiers.description: Designate one target. The next ally to attack them gets a +1 bonus to their attack roll.

tiers.name: Exploit Opportunity
tiers.description: Target an enemy. Grant the next ally attacking them a +1d4 bonus to their damage roll.

tiers.name: Piercing Command
tiers.description: Your next attack also gives an adjacent ally +2 Armor Pierce against that target for 1 round.

tiers.name: Coordinated Strike
tiers.description: Grant all adjacent allies a +1d4 bonus damage roll on their next successful attack against that target.

tiers.name: Strategic Opening
tiers.description: Target an enemy. The enemy suffers a -2 penalty to Defense against all incoming attacks for 1 round.

tiers.name: Focus Fire
tiers.description: Grant all allies a +1 bonus to all attack rolls against a single designated target for 2 rounds.

tiers.name: Leadership Momentum
tiers.description: Deliver an attack. If successful, all allies in the encounter gain +2m movement on their next turn.

tiers.name: Coordinated Assault
tiers.description: Your successful attack also grants an adjacent ally a free T1 (1d4 damage) attack against the target.

tiers.name: Rally Strike of Annihilation
tiers.description: Your successful attack allows all allies to make a free T1 (1d4 damage) attack against the target immediately.

tiers.name: Inspiring Word
tiers.description: Restore 1d6 Composure OR 1d4 HP to yourself or an adjacent ally.

tiers.name: Remove Shaken
tiers.description: Instantly remove the Shaken status from an ally.

tiers.name: Rallying Cry
tiers.description: Restore 2d4 Composure to all allies within 5m.

tiers.name: Unbreakable Morale
tiers.description: Grant all allies immunity to T1 Fear effects for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Group Resolve
tiers.description: All allies within 5m gain a +2 bonus to all Willpower checks for 3 rounds.

tiers.name: Battlefield Command
tiers.description: Grant up to 2 allies a bonus 2m movement on their next turn.

tiers.name: Mass Clarity
tiers.description: Restore 3d6 Composure to all allies within 10m.

tiers.name: Immunity Aura
tiers.description: Grant all allies immunity to Composure loss for 2 rounds.

tiers.name: Total Dominance
tiers.description: Grant all allies a temporary +2 increase to their Charm stat for the remainder of the encounter.
